body_html:
Thanks @aselle . It is reasonable and we can the base64 op from exported model.

But we want to train the model once and deploy to Serving/Android/iOS. It would be great if all the running devices can load the same model signature without any modification.

body:
Thanks @aselle . It is reasonable and we can the base64 op from exported model.

But we want to train the model once and deploy to Serving/Android/iOS. It would be great if all the running devices can load the same model signature without any modification.
